fields.name: Fin du Monde
fields.description: To date, La Fin du Monde has earned more medals and awards in major international competitions than any other Canadian beer. It is Unibroue's international flagship ale.

fields.name: Trois Pistoles
fields.description: Due to its complex character, this beer immediately attracted a lot of fans. Its fruity notes and high alcohol level often draw comparisons to port.

fields.name: Guinness Draught
fields.description: Rich and creamy. Distinctively black. Velvety in its finish. This iconic beer is defined by harmony. Sip after sip, sweet counters bitter as the malt arrives on cue to complement a base of roasted barley. Just as the unmistakable white head sits flush atop the dark beer, so do the flavours counter and combine perfectly. This is our greatest innovation. Truly unique. Perfectly balanced.

fields.name: Corona
fields.description: Light, generous in the mouth and sweet on the finish

fields.name: Brooklyn Lager
fields.description: Light caramel flavor with bitterness on the finish

fields.name: Kilkenny
fields.description: Strong malt flavor and generous in the mouth. This beer is, with Guinness, certainly most famous Irish beer.

fields.name: Prix Garantie Beer
fields.description: Certainly the most famous beer in Switzerland. Inexpensive and very pleasant to taste

fields.name: Blonde Grimbergen
fields.description: All Grimbergen beers come from Grimbergen Abbey. A refined and fruity beer with a hint of strong spices.

fields.name: White Grimbergen
fields.description: All Grimbergen beers come from Grimbergen Abbey. Refreshing and fruity with citrus aromas

fields.name: Red Grimbergen
fields.description: All Grimbergen beers come from Grimbergen Abbey. Red Grimbergen combines the complex aromas of red fruits like strawberry with clove shades and a slightly spicy note.
